title: Elobooster/ Smurf
body:
KonGqueror a player that i just played with has said many times in game that he/she is a elo booster and a smurf and i find it so unfair. Can rito please do something about it he/she is making it so fuckign unfair for everyone else to vs her as he/she has more experience and i got care about the don't say peoples name but this one I'm saying he/she needs to be banned from that account for eloboosting someone and surfing she even said it in game.
Thanks rito
